job.command:
starver SL16d
cp /global/project/projectdirs/starprod/rnc/mustafa/Run14/AuAu/200GeV/Pico16a/P16id/analysis/D0/fastSim_tmvaTrees/D0_tmvaTree.toyMc.root $SCRATCH cp /global/project/projectdirs/starprod/rnc/mustafa/Run14/AuAu/200GeV/Pico16a/P16id/analysis/D0/production/backgroundTrees/D0_background.2016-07-08.root $SCRATCH
root -l -b <<EOF .L tmvaD0.C++ float const minPt = 0.3; tmvaD0($JOBINDEX, minPt, "D0_tmvaTree.toyMc.root", "D0_background.2016-07-08.root") .q EOF
